body: @HylianWolf  Not actually gay, but I understand where you are coming from- probably being terrified of your own butthole / sexuality, and ready to apply the "1 drop rule" to anything unseemly lest you offend Jesus or just your own highly fragile masculine pride.  One suggestion: find what tags you like, and then search them.  Rather than clicking on any random thumbnail you see.  It would make Jesus happy.
